sentence: PA-Sen: The super PAC Honor Pennsylvania's new commercial against TV personality Mehmet Oz uses footage from his show to argue he's a "Republican in name only," including a 2013 clip of him enthusiastically jumping up and down with Michelle Obama.
title: Morning Digest: Longtime Democratic power player on Long Island will not seek

sentence: includes such luminaries as Mehmet Oz, Ben Carson, Scott Atlas, and Ronny Jackson, the dude who turned a slovenly heap of fly-pocked Crisco into a Greek Adonis through the magic of barmy bullsh*t. Now Jackson, who leveraged his unique proximity to Donald Trump’s eminently unkissable bum into a congressional seat, is under investigation by the House Ethics Committee.
title: House doc who praised Trump's 'good genes,' is under investigation

sentence: “I’m a gambler,” Trump told one aide about wading into the Pennsylvania primary a second time—this time to endorse fellow TV huckster Dr. Mehmet Oz.
title: Trump's loving every minute of kneecapping Republicans' midterm chances

sentence: Democrats clearly see their best pickup opportunity in Pennsylvania, where Trump recently endorsed fellow TV huckster Dr. Mehmet Oz.
